message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I think a 60/40 split is a fairer reflection of my efforts. Let's move forward!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I think I deserve more. Let's see what you think!
Let's compromise. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I still believe a 55/45 split is fair.  What do you say?
I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a 50/50 split again. Let's make a deal!
